meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lazy.
meanings.sent1: Her lazinesses were evident when she refused to get out of bed all day.
meanings.sent2: His lazinesses often led to unfinished tasks and missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The lazinesses of the cat were on full display as it lounged in the sun all afternoon.
meanings.sent4: The lazinesses of the old car were apparent in its reluctance to start on cold mornings.
meanings.sent5: The lazinesses of the student became a hindrance to his academic progress.

meanings.definition: The tendency to avoid work or exertion.
meanings.sent1: Despite his lazinesses, he managed to complete the project just in time.
meanings.sent2: The lazinesses of the employees resulted in a decline in productivity.
meanings.sent3: The lazinesses of the squirrel were evident as it tried to steal food instead of gathering its own.
meanings.sent4: Her lazinesses were like a heavy weight dragging her down in achieving her goals.
meanings.sent5: The lazinesses of the clouds delayed the arrival of the storm.
